```{r}

#Wells diagnosticity Ratio calculated from vector/list
wdiag_ratio <- function(vec1, vec2, x){
a <- sum(vec1 == x)/(length(vec1)+1)
b <-sum(vec2 == x)/(length(vec2)+2)
c <- a/b
}

print(wdiag_ratio(vvec, yvec, 4))



```
